Text:
Tenorshare Data Recovery is a powerful data recovery program that can recover lost, formatted, misplaced or accidently deleted documents, photos, video, music, etc. from hard drive, USB flash drive, memory card, memory stick, SD card, CF Card and so on. Files in deleted/formatted Windows partition as well as all removable storage devices can be rescued efficiently. You can also backup and restore partition with it.It not only supports recovering data with FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS file system, but also HFS, HFS+ and EXT2, EXT3 file system. RAID 0 and RAID 5 data recovery is available,too.
http://www.any-data-recovery.com/product/datarecoverystandard.htm
